bibl.title: The Roman Agricultural Economy. Organization, Investment, and Production = Oxford Studies on the Roman Economy.

series.title: Oxford Studies on the Roman Economy.

bibl.note: 9 contributions held at the occasion of the third annual conference of the Oxford Roman Economy Project (Oxford, 3 october 2008). - Pp. 1-32: A.B. & A.W., Introduction. Quantifying Roman Agriculture.
bibl.seg: Alan Bowman & Andrew Wilson (edd.), The Roman Agricultural Economy. Organization, Investment, and Production = Oxford Studies on the Roman Economy.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2013, 8°, xviii-333 pp., tabl., figg., cartes. ISBN 978-0-19-966572-3. £75.
9 contributions held at the occasion of the third annual conference of the Oxford Roman Economy Project (Oxford, 3 october 2008). - Pp. 1-32: A.B. & A.W., Introduction. Quantifying Roman Agriculture.
C.R. par Taco Terpstra, CJ 109 (2013-2014) pp. 378-380. - Dominic Rathbone, JRS 104 (2014) pp. 294-295.
